title: Opening Ceremonies
description: It's time to swim on over to Opening Ceremonies! Everfree Northwest 2018 proudly welcomes all our attendees to our 7th annual event. Join us for a welcome from the Chairs, special appearances from our VIP guests, a short skit, and maybe some other surprises!

title: Buck: Legacy
description: Discover the dungeon-exploring pony card game, Buck: Legacy! Dive straight into a fantasy adventure and play a game at this event, where you'll also meet the game's creator! Players of all skill levels welcome. Never heard of the game before? Stop by and learn!

title: Good Morning Gaming
description: Wake up early and get right to playing your favorite games with friends!

title: Silly Slime
description: Join us to make your personalized slime to keep. Make it glittery or gooey- you decide!

title: Sparkle Kitty
description: Dark forces have trapped a group of princesses into cursed towers. But luckily these are no ordinary princesses and you are no ordinary player. Take matters into your own hands and harness the simple and sweet words into special spell combinations to set yourself free!

title: Making Friends is Magic
description: EFNW is a great place to make new friends! Come meet ponies from far and wide in this speed-friending event. Fluttershies welcome!

title: Ponegathon - Round I - Open Entry
description: We kick off our epic 3-day Ponegathon championship with this open-entry elimination round! All are welcome to enter, but not all will advance. One champion will survive all 4 rounds to be honored with glory and prizes at Closing Ceremonies on Sunday!

title: Rainbow Dash Fan Club
description: Calling all Rainbow Dash Fans! Join the voice of Rainbow Dash and the voices of some of her biggest fans as we take an insider look at some of her standout moments from the series. Bring your best questions for Ashleigh Ball, Jason Deline, Sarah Edmondson, and Ryan Beil, and prepare yourself for some awesome answers!

title: Quills and Sofas with Josh Haber and G.M. Berrow
description: It takes a lot of work to be show writers!  Join the Everfree NW staff as we sit down with G.M. Berrow and Josh Haber to talk about their favourite things about writing, their least favourite things, and everything that falls in between having an idea and getting it down on paper!

title: Face-Painting with Pony Friends!
description: Come get your face painted by our talented Community Guest Cosplayers, dressed as your favorite MLP characters!

title: Painting in 10 seconds flat!
description: Boulder Media artist Imalou will show you how to digitally paint majestic ponies in no time!

title: Karaoke
description: Think you've got what it takes to sing with the Sirens? Join us as we sing along with our favorite songs from the show and the fandom!

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it! Or just come to chill.

title: MLP:CCG Learn to Play & Casual Play
description: Everypony is welcome to help solve all of Equestria's problems as you learn to play the official Collectible Card Game, and get a prize just for participating (while supplies last)! No prior gaming experience needed! Have a friend? Learn to play together! It takes about 20 minutes, so stop by! Foals welcome, but age 6+ recommended.

title: King of Tokyo
description: Ever wanted to rule Tokyo as a colossal rampaging monster? Well step on up to be the King! But be careful, there are others fighting for the title as well!

title: Don't Forget the Lyrics
description: Come put your memory of MLP song lyrics to the test. Can you keep singing when the ponies stop? Participate receive an exclusive button!

title: Clamshell Friends with Applejack, Fluttershy, and Rarity
description: Join Applejack, Fluttershy, and Rarity for a chance to unleash your creativity. Create a little clam friend to keep you company!

title: Writer's Block
description: Ever get stuck writing that scene that just doesn’t work? Hate it when you feel like you're not able to just get your story going?  Join The Albinocorn and EFNW staff as they give suggestions to folks on how to get out of that slump that we can sometimes get to in our lives as writers.

title: Six Degrees of Pinkie Pie
description: Join Andrea Libman, Ingrid Nilson, Richard Newman, and Brenda Crichlow for a look at Pinkie Pie’s crazy connections to anypony and every creature on the show. This is your best chance to ask questions and get an answer straight from the pony, or donkey’s mouth.

title: MLP book reading with G.M. Berrow and Josh Haber
description: Join our VIPs, author G.M. Berrow and Josh Haber, for a reading from some of the official MLP books!

title: Tumblrpon 202 - How to Run a Blog
description: How do new stories and art spread in the MLP community? Join CouchCrusader and Silfoe to learn what goes into creating and maintaining interest on fan blogs.

title: So you Want to Start a Convention?
description: Many fans are extremely ambitious, and want to build their own piece of Equestria. But what does it take to create such a massive event? And how can you avoid the pitfalls that have sunk other conventions in their first year?

title: Manes and Tails - All About Wigs
description: A hands-on workshop all about wigs. We’ll cover the basics of wearing, styling, and maintaining wigs using donated wigs from Pisara Wigs. Beginners and veterans are both sure to learn something!

title: Brony Debates Live
description: How about an academic critical-thinking-focused debate on the philosophy of MLP? Join analyst Brawny Buck in taking on the roles of both student and teacher as we explore Friendship is Magic in a unique way.

title: Writing Into the Sunset
description: The world of Equestria Girls isn't too far off from our own world. Join The Albinocorn, Oroboro, and Everfree NW staff as we discuss our favourite parts about Equestria Girls, and how to write pony in the human world.

title: Buck: Legacy
description: Discover the dungeon-exploring pony card game, Buck: Legacy! Dive straight into a fantasy adventure and play a game at this event, where you'll also meet the game's creator! Players of all skill levels welcome. Never heard of the game before? Stop by and learn!

title: MLP:CCG Draft Tournament
description: Test your skill against others players in this fun draft event; no constructed deck needed! 35-minute Swiss rounds. This will be run as a Tier 1 event; Enterplay Tournament Floor Rules will be in effect. All necessary materials will be provided. Prizes will be awarded based on match record. $15 entry fee.

title: EAST Corp Productions & The Fallout: Equestria Extended Universe
description: EAST Corp Productions discusses the writing, voice acting, music, and radio plays of their many series in the Fallout: Equestria universe. Aspiring writers and creators welcome!

title: Open Gaming
description: There are so many games to play that we couldn't fit them all in! Drop by and  play one of them!

title: The Art of MLP
description: My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic is known not only for its colorful characters but also for its incredible art. Come meet Directors Jim Miller and Katrina Hadley, along with longtime community and professional artist PixelKitties as they reflect on how art has impacted the world of MLP, inside and out.

title: Brony Nostalgia
description: What are some of your favorite "back in the day" memories of ponies and the fandom? Come talk about how we joined up, old jokes, fan fics, videos, and music.

title: Party Favors with Pinkie Pie!
description: Wanna party with Pinkie? Of course you do! Join our official cosplayers and make accessories and toys for a party!

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it! Or just come to chill.

title: Bingo with Marina and Mocha Sunrise!
description: Join con mascots Mocha Sunrise and Marina the Orca Pony to play the game we all know and love for a chance to win some super fun prizes!

title: Introduction to Sewing
description: Interested in sewing but not sure where to start? We'll go over all of the basics to give you a hoof up!

title: Role Player Meetup
description: Have you and your crew seen the far edges of the galaxy, or slain an evil lich? Come share your stories with other role players, learn how to get into role playing games yourself, or just come hang out and have a great time!

title: Open Read and Critique Friday
description: A group of rapid fire editing groups!  Got a story? Stuck on a scene? This is about getting a few minutes to read your hook, and then get rapid fire reviews! A con favourite for Everfree!

title: The Princess Paradox
description: From classic fairy tales to the rulers of Equestria, the image of "princess" is a big part of our culture. Join Silver Quill for a look at what princesses represent and the balance between storytelling and merchandising.

title: Ponegathon - Round II
description: Come and join us for the second round of Ponegathon, our annual weekend-long contest of skill! Everyone is free to join us as our contestants who survived the previous round continue their fight to the top! The winners of this round will continue on to Saturday's round!

title: Dance Dance Revolution
description: Here's one game you can play even with four hooves! Bring your best moves and have a dance off with your friends!

title: Starswirl & Shadows
description: Dustykatt and Foalpapers take a look into the world of heroes and villains with special guests Chris Britton and Bill Newton, the voices of the enigmatic Starswirl the Bearded and the mysterious Pony of Shadows.

title: So You Want To Make a Pattern, Huh?
description: Want to make your own cosplay or clothes, but patterns make you scratch your head? We'll we go over the ins and outs of patterns and even how to make your own!

title: Rainbow Dash's Best Young Fliers Academy
description: VIP voice of Rainbow Dash (Ashleigh Ball) joins Bow Hothoof (Jason Deline), Windy Whistles (Sarah Edmondson), and show directors Katrina Hadley and Jim Miller to lead our foals through a series of activities at our version of the Best Young Fliers Academy.

title: Mermaid Necklaces with Marina and Friends
description: With the help of Marina and her pony friends, make your own magical mermaid necklace with shells and beads!

title: All Aboard the Feels Train
description: Writing often offers us opportunities to explore some of the harder topics in life. But it's not always easy getting an emotionally charged scene to work.  Join Monochromatic and Oroboro in a discussion on how to write emotional scenes without leaving your readers wondering why they should care.

title: Beyond the Broken Barriers: of MLP, Autism, and Equines
description: Professional horsewoman by day / brony reviewer by night, the Dark Horse of K.C. will discuss how MLP has made such an impact to those of different abilities, mostly to the autistic side of the fandom, and those beyond.

title: Small World
description: Everybody wants to rule the world. But there's only so much room in Smallworld! Crazy combinations of fantasy races and fantastic traits collide as civilizations rise and fall.

title: Iron Cosplay
description: Love cosplay? Fancy yourself a master of the craft? Teams of 3 battle to create the best costume out of random materials. 3 rounds, 3 themes, 3 secret ingredients! Fabulous prizes! All skill levels welcome.

title: Tree of Friendship Meet-and-Greet
description: Tree of Friendship Meet-and-Greet with Andrea Libman, Ingrid Nilson, Ryan Beil, Richard Newman, and Brenda Crichlow.

title: Reviewing With ILoveKimPossibleAlot
description: Join ILoveKimPossibleAlot for an audience-interactive analysis of the themes of MLP and a look at her video production process. Also features a Q&A and exclusive premiere of KP content.

title: MLP:CCG Learn to Play & Casual Play
description: Everypony is welcome to help solve all of Equestria's problems as you learn to play the official Collectible Card Game, and get a prize just for participating (while supplies last)! No prior gaming experience needed! Have a friend? Learn to play together! It takes about 20 minutes, so stop by! Foals welcome, but age 6+ recommended.

title: Shy and Pie Family Dinner
description: VIP Dinner with Andrea Libman, Ingrid Nilson, Ryan Beil, Richard Newman, and Brenda Crichlow.

title: Create your own Pirate Map!
description: X marks the spot and you can put it where ever you want to on your own map! Create a treasure map for you and your friends to follow and tie it up to protect it.

title: The Shipping Express
description: In the world of MLP, we have interesting and unique challenges in writing relationships. Join Monochromatic, Oroboro, The Albinocorn, and the EFNW staff as we discuss ways to write ships, avoid pitfalls of shipping, and write relationships that feel authentic, even if they seem a bit off the wall.

title: Unicorn Planters
description: Grow your own tree of friendship in a magical planter you can make yourself!

title: Villain 101
description: Want to know what it takes to be a villain in the land of Equestria? Sunset Shimmer, Starlight Glimmer, and Nightmare Moon will show you their evil ways. Learn how to scheme successfully at this all-ages-friendly evil villain meeting!

title: A Monkey's Art Talk
description: Fan-artist AssasinMonkey talks from the heart about art and the universe around it, sharing his artistic experience, perspective, and why everyone is important. Q&A to follow.

title: Pajama Gaming Party
description: Snuggle up in your PJ's and come play some games! Let's wind down the evening with some fun!

title: Ponystock
description: Everfree’s perennial concert is back with yet another night of amazing performances from some of your favorite community musicians, including Silva Hound, Odyssey Eurobeat, and so many more! You better come ready for a party!

title: MLP:CCG Harmony Tournament
description: Bring your best Harmony-format deck and compete for packs and other awesome prizes! Will the existing powerhouses continue to perform well, or will new deck rise up thanks to the release of Seaquestria & Beyond? This will be run as a Tier 1 event; Enterplay Tournament Floor rules will be in effect. Prizes will be awarded based on match record. $5 entry fee.

title: Pajama Gaming Party and Ponyfinder
description: Snuggle up in your PJ's and come play some games! Ponyfinder creator David Silver will be on hoof from 7 PM to 9 PM as players explore the realm of Everglow. Let's wind down the evening with some fun!

title: Creating Transformative Art – History of Fanfiction and Retelling Existing Works in New Ways
description: Delve into the history of stories, art, and fanfiction- writers through the ages each adding their "transformative" touch. Discuss influential works of the last century, implications of copyright, and improving your own work.

title: Sussing out a Synopsis
description: Fimfiction has a very narrow window with which you can use to hook readers.  Often what readers see about a story before deciding to read it is the synopsis. Join the writing track as we discuss ways to best build a striking synopsis so readers want to give your story more than just a once over.

title: LGBT+ 'Becoming Everfree'
description: Join Joy Thayer and Dana Simpson as they explore subjects like bullying, hurtful situations, and LGBT+ issues in the fandom and beyond. Expect a lot of humor, positivity, and heart. Be sure to bring your questions, comments… and maybe a tissue or two!

title: Art of the Dress
description: Hello darlings! Have you always wanted to enter the fabulous world of cosplay? Join our panel of talented pony cosplayers to find out how to get started in the hobby.

title: Critical Threat Roll
description: The hardest part about being a writer is having to take feedback. This is often a scary, potentially ego-risky process for many authors. Join us as we discuss how to take constructive criticism well, how to work with an Editor, and how to not lose your mind in the process.

title: ILoveKimPossibleAlot and Josh Riff "Kim Possible: A Sitch In Time"
description: Have you ever watched "Kim Possible"? NO!?! What's wrong with you? Whether this is your first time with "Kim Possible" or if you're a long-time fan, join the Everfree Northwest tradition of the ILoveKimPossibleAlot and Josh Schocher riffing panel! If time allows, stay tuned for Kim Possible trivia and prizes!

title: A Yoyo Panel
description: A panel about yoyos! Learn about modern yoyos, how they differ from 90s yoyos, various styles / tricks, and how competitions work. See some sweet tricks and learn how to get started yourself.

title: Artist and Writer Hangout - Friday
description: It's been a long day of con-going, and maybe you just want a place to chill for a bit. Join a bunch of artists and writers hanging out together. Talk shop, rest your sore hooves, and maybe catch your breath if you've been hanging out at Ponystock!

title: MLP:CCG Nightmare Tournament
description: Ever look at the list of banned cards and wonder why they got there in the first place? Here’s your chance to find out! For this constructed tournament, there will be NO BANLIST; all cards that have been officially released by Enterplay will be legal to play. Some custom rules will be in effect. Free entry.

title: Betrayal at House on the Hill & Betrayal at Baldur's Gate
description: As the day ends, a new adventure begins! Bring your friends and explore the haunted mansion and the streets of Bauldur's Gate. Be warned, there might be a traitor among you...

title: Good Morning Gaming II
description: After a good night's sleep, we're back for more gaming in the morning! Join us for the highly anticipated sequel to yesterday's Good Morning Gaming!

title: Making Friends is Magic
description: EFNW is a great place to make new friends! Come meet ponies from far and wide in this speed-friending event. Fluttershies welcome!

title: Buck: Legacy
description: Discover the dungeon-exploring pony card game, Buck: Legacy! Dive straight into a fantasy adventure and play a game at this event, where you'll also meet the game's creator! Players of all skill levels welcome. Never heard of the game before? Stop by and learn!

title: Saturday Morning Cartoons
description: The early bird gets the episode screening! Wake up bright and early for a special viewing of an episode of MLP:FiM and MLP:EqG featuring commentary from directors Jim Miller and Katrina Hadley along with writers Josh Haber and G.M. Berrow. (Cereal not provided.)

title: Silly Slime
description: Join us to make your personalized slime to keep. Make it glittery or gooey- you decide!

title: The Evolution of Brony Music: From 2010 to Today
description: Let's discuss the history of brony music- from its humble beginnings in 2010 to technological innovation in music to the scene's current state.

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it! Or just come to chill.

title: MLP:CCG Core Tournament
description: Bring your best constructed deck using cards from Equestrian Odysseys forward, and face the competition! This will be run as a Tier 1 event; Enterplay Tournament Floor rules will be in effect. Prizes will be awarded based on match record; decklists are required. $5 entry fee.

title: Phoebe & Her Unicorn with Dana Simpson
description: Listen as the characters from Phoebe and her Unicorn are brought to life with author and cartoonist Dana Simpson!

title: Crash Course in Creative Writing
description: Ever wanted to know how a lot of writers get started? Frequently getting stuck in the planning stages? Here we discuss a few things that may help take your story from the thought at the back of your mind, to getting it down on paper.

title: How to Draw Ponies
description: Learn to draw ponies! Follow along with a practiced MLP fan-artist with the opportunity to ask any questions and even get individual constructive criticism of your own work. Anyone and everyone can improve!

title: Dixit
description: Stop by for a round of this light-hearted card matching game where you try to guess which card matches the story. Think "Apples to Apples," but with surreal art!

title: Open Read and Critique: Saturday
description: A group of rapid fire editing groups! Got a story? Stuck on a scene? This is about getting a few minutes to read your hook, and then get rapid fire reviews! A con favourite for Everfree!

title: Pony Definition
description: The game of fun with a pun is back! Based on the classic Canadian game show, but with a pony twist! A bit like Wheel of Fortune, but with bad/amazing puns. Prizes too! (Just remember to ask for a "zed", and not a "zee"!)

title: Harmony Through Health
description: Come ready to move as fitness professional and brony analyst Brawny Buck shows how even small changes can make big impacts on your health and happiness, so that you can help others do the same.

title: A Pony Picnic
description: Mocha, Rarity, & Fluttershy are hosting a picnic and you're invited! Your favorite ponies will be there too; it wouldn't be a PARTY without Pinkie would it? Spike, Dashie, AJ, Princess Twilight Sparkle, Front Page, Marina, Sharpie, & Novella too!

title: The Cake Is A Lie
description: The male voices behind memorable characters from My Little Pony may seem a little out of place in such a colorful world. Join Silver Quill as he explores all that is manly about voicing magical ponies with Bill Newton, Ryan Beil, Chris Britton, Richard Newman, and Jason Deline.

title: Ask the Princesses
description: Hear-ye, hear-ye! The Four Princesses of Equestria, Celestia, Luna, Cadence, and Twilight have traveled all the way to Seaddle to answer your questions! Expect royal hilarity.

title: Fabric Painting
description: A hands-on workshop on fabric painting, covering two different techniques for adding custom designs to fabric. Attendees will get to paint their own canvas tote bag.

title: Dance Dance Revolution
description: Here's one game you can play even with four hooves! Bring your best moves and have a dance off with your friends!

title: Friendship Bracelets
description: Have you made a special friend this year? Exchange a friendship bracelet so you never forget them!

title: Machi Koro
description: Welcome to the city of Machi Koro. You've just been elected Mayor. Congrats! Unfortunately the citizens have some pretty big demands. Each player wants to develop the city on their own terms in order to complete all of the landmarks under construction faster than their rivals

title: Cosplay Contest/Chess Signups
description: Pre-signup for the cosplay contest and Cosplay Chess! You must sign up here to participate in either event and slots are limited. All costumes must be MLP-related and family friendly! Special Foal's division for cosplay contest!

title: Pony Libs
description: It's fun for societies to read fiction about themselves from across dimensions. Unfortunately, sometimes a few words get lost during mirror-transit... Come see what Equestrians might be reading by working as an audience to randomly fill in missing words from our dimension's pony fiction.

title: Meet the Musicians
description: A Q&A with the musicians of Ponystock and The Grand Galloping Gala.

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it!

title: Face-Painting with the Princesses
description: Equestria's royalty is here to PAINT YOUR FACE. Join our Community Guest cosplayers as Princesses Celestia, Luna, Cadance, and Twilight put their artistic skills to task.

title: Secrets and Pies
description: The female voices behind My Little Pony have a few secrets up their sleeves. ILoveKimPossibleAlot takes the reins for this in depth look at -Girl Power- on the show and in the industry at large, with special guests: Ashleigh Ball, Andrea Libman, Ingrid Nilson, Sarah Edmondson, and Brenda Crichlow!

title: Iron Author Contest.
description: An EFNW exclusive for 6 years running! Join other writers in a contest of wills, wits, and writing speed! Get a story prompt, then write it in 2 hours.  Winners to be announced and prizes to be distributed on Sunday!

title: MLP:CCG Learn to Play & Casual Play
description: Everypony is welcome to help solve all of Equestria's problems as you learn to play the official Collectible Card Game, and get a prize just for participating (while supplies last)! No prior gaming experience needed! Have a friend? Learn to play together! It takes about 20 minutes, so stop by! Foals welcome, but age 6+ recommended.

title: Craft Foam Armor Part 1
description: Part 1 of our hands-on workshop for craft foam armor. (Part 2 on Sunday.) We’ll cover patterning, heat setting, attaching armor pieces, and some nifty hot glue tricks. Attendees will get to make their own craft foam armor bracelets / gauntlets.

title: Plushie 101: Cleaning and Care
description: Is your mane looking a bit messy? Your coat lacking the luster it once had? Are you popping a seam? Then you might be a plushie! Learn how to properly clean and repair your plushies and give them the TLC they deserve!

title: Buck: Legacy
description: Discover the dungeon-exploring pony card game, Buck: Legacy! Dive straight into a fantasy adventure and play a game at this event, where you'll also meet the game's creator! Players of all skill levels welcome. Never heard of the game before? Stop by and learn!

title: My Little Rock Band Tournament
description: Who's the greatest at My Little Rock Band? Could it be you? Sign up and join us for the tournament to find out or drop by to enjoy the show!

title: Karaoke with DJ Trishy
description: Come sing your heart out with DJ Trishy's karaoke!

title: Mermaid Necklaces
description: With the help of Marina and her pony friends, make your own magical mermaid necklace with shells and beads!

title: MLP:CCG Team Sealed Tournament
description: Bring two friends or make two new ones in this semi-cooperative event where a team of three players gets 16 packs to build three decks, then splits up to play one-on-one against another team of three players. This will be run as a Tier 1 event; Enterplay Tournament Floor rules will be in effect. Prizes will be awarded based on match record. $20 entry fee per player.

title: The Psychology of Identifying with Characters
description: Why do we identify so strongly with certain MLP characters- or even make our own? We imagine, write fanfic, and collect plushies. Why do we do this and how does it help us in “real life?" Discuss with Dr. Raymond Biersbach, a licensed psychologist.

title: Dial It to 11
description: What can you do when there's a scene or episode you don't like, but aren't sure how to express it to the larger community? Silver Quill looks at how comedy can bridge disagreeing viewpoints and provoke thought by dialing everything to 11!

title: EFNW 2018 Cosplay Contest
description: Check out this year’s cosplay contest finalists as they strut their stuff, showing off their creative and kooky costumes.There are several categories to compete in, including a special Foal’s Division, so don't forget to register at the Cosplay Contest Signups Saturday afternoon, or come cheer on your favorites.

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it! Or just come to chill.

title: Pony Programmers Panel
description: From apps to websites to full games, the MLP fandom has spawned amazing fan projects. This panel showcases some of the work from the tech side, featuring talks from the folks behind the projects.

title: Boss Monster
description: Stories usually revolve around the heroes, but what of the villains? Take up the role of a dungeon boss and build up your dungeon to deal with pesky heroes that have come to defeat you.

title: Pirate Eye-Patches!
description: Want to look like a pirate? Then come in and create your own eye patch. Or just practice talking like a pirate!

title: Ask the Mane 6! (and Spike!)
description: Got questions for the Mane 6? Come meet everyone's favorite pony friends (and a loveable dragon!)

title: Cosplay Meet & Greet
description: If you love cosplay and want to socialize with others like you, head up to Maxi's on the top floor for this photoshoot/meet & greet event!

title: Zootopia Minute LIVE
description: Join Simul and Choco as they review and analyze the movie Zootopia one minute at a time! Join for a fun on (and off) topic discussion about our favorite fuzzy Disney movie along with a special surprise guest. Special button given to all who attend.

title: Creating Characters with MLP Writers and Directors
description: Join Josh Haber and G.M. Berrow along with Katrina Hadley and Jim Miller of the MLP creation team as they discuss their favourite parts about making characters, writing, editing, and working across various types of media!

title: Party Favors
description: Make accessories and toys for a party!

title: Community Artists Showcase
description: Some of your favorite MLP fan artists from the community host a discussion on art in the fandom and their experiences within the show's trhiving creative community. Got a burning art question? Make sure not to miss this one!

title: Ponegathon - Round III
description: Come and join us for the third round of Ponegathon, our annual weekend-long contest of skill! Everyone is free to join us as our remaining contestants fight onward for glory! The winners of this round will continue onward to the finals on Sunday!

title: Splendor
description: Build a gem trading empire that Rarity would be jealous of - but beware! Your rivals can see your every move just as you can theirs. Outwit and outplan your opponents to win! Splendid!

title: Pinkie Pie's Party Games
description: VIP voice of Pinkie Pie and Fluttershy (Andrea Libman) joins Maud Pie (Ingrid Nilson), Zephyr Breeze (Ryan Beil), Cranky Doodle (Richard Newman) and Matilda/Zecora (Brenda Crichlow) for a series of high flying family party activities with our foals.

title: Equestria Girls: Then and Now
description: How did Equestria Girls change from a controversial new series to a beloved show today? Two major fans will discuss the history and legacy of Equestria Girls and how it's affected Friendship is Magic.

title: Them's Fightin' Herds Tournament
description: The Predators draw near, but who will be the Key Keeper that protects all of Fœnum? There's only one way to find out, and that's with some friendly competition to see who among us will be the champion of the tournament!

title: Cosplay Chess
description: Interested in seeing your favorite ponies duke it out? Or maybe even king / queen it out? Join Twilight Sparkle as she tries to play the funnest (and worst!) game of chess with full-size, live-action people!

title: Vexed by Villians
description: What makes a 'bad guy' compelling and unique? Do you sometimes struggle to write bad guys? Join The Albinocorn and the staff of EFNW as we discover what ingredients go into creating a well rounded villain that your readers love to hate. Or perhaps hate to love.

title: God and Ponies - Faith in the Fandom
description: It may seem like a strange combination, but many of us find a real expression of our faith in the values of MLP. Come discuss the special meaning we've found in this community. (All faiths / no faith welcome.)

title: Tree of Friendship Meet-and-Greet
description: Tree of Friendship Meet-and-Greet with Ashleigh Ball, Jason Deline, Sarah Edmondson, Chris Britton, and Bill Newton.

title: Tails Of Equestria
description: Enjoy storytelling and adventurous games about ponies? Of course you do, who wouldn't? Join us at an introductory session of Tails of Equestria where you'll learn how to play the official, story focused role-playing game.

title: Friendship Bracelets
description: Have you made a special friend this year? Exchange a friendship bracelet so you never forget them!

title: Apple Dine and Dash
description: VIP Dinner with Ashleigh Ball, Jason Deline, Sarah Edmondson, Chris Britton, and Bill Newton.

title: Starting A Fan Project with ILoveKimPossibleAlot
description: Ever wanted to start a fan project? Join ILoveKimPossibleAlot in a workshop-like panel on reaching out to others, making sure your ideas are good, and ensuring a successful project!

title: Setting the Setting
description: Learn how to immerse your characters in a rich, detailed world. Bring themes to life with subtle writing tricks, and find ways to use your setting to set your world apart!

title: MLP:CCG Learn to Play & Casual Play
description: Everypony is welcome to help solve all of Equestria's problems as you learn to play the official Collectible Card Game, and get a prize just for participating (while supplies last)! No prior gaming experience needed! Have a friend? Learn to play together! It takes about 20 minutes, so stop by! Foals welcome, but age 6+ recommended.

title: So You Want to be a Con Artist?
description: Want to start selling art at cons or just up your game? Learn the tips and tricks of vending, how to apply for cons, the best booth displays, what kind of art sells, and more.

title: Grand Galloping Gala
description: The Gala was such a big hit last year that we decided to bring it back! It's open to attendees of all ages, whether you're in fancy wear or not. No extra ticket required. Featuring music from the show along with popular hits, plus a special visit from some of our VIP Guests, it's great for all ages!

title: Equestrian Idol
description: Like My Little Karaoke? Then sign up for Equestrian Idol and compete to be crowned the next "Princess of Karaoke!"

title: Hot Pepper Reviews: The Revenge
description: It's back! Come watch some very brave fans do their best to give a faithful review of MLP episodes following the ingestion of some VERY hot peppers. Milk provided for volunteers. >:)

title: Fallout Equestria
description: Fallout: Equestria was an explosively popular fanfiction. Join Heartshine and Novel-Idea as they discuss the main fic, side stories, and everything else in this unique subfandom.

title: MLP:CCG Villain Challenge
description: Queen Chrysalis is back for another attempt at world domination in this fan-created cooperative format! It takes three players to match her might: will you answer the call to help defend Equestria and defeat the villain? Special deckbuilding rules are required for these events. Teams will need to sign up for a time slot in advance; individuals who sign up without a team will attempt to paired on a first-come, first-serve basis. Free entry.

title: Sketches from a Hat
description: Write down your drawing idea, drop it in the hat, and watch as our panel of artists sketch as many as they can! If your idea is randomly selected, you even get to keep the sketch!

title: World Building in Equestria
description: World-building is often overlooked in tabletop gaming, leading to lack of detail and depth. This panel gives tips and ideas for creating comprehensive settings for a more enjoyable game experience.

title: Fight Club
description: First Rule of Fight Club: Tell Your Friends About Fight Club. Join us for some fun fighting games with your friends or make new ones after a round or two!

title: Twilight Sparkle's Secret Shipfic Folder
description: There are so many ships in this folder it should be an ocean! Build a grid of ponies and relationships as you write the stories that match your goals - all skill levels welcome! (PG-13)

title: Joining The Herd Stories
description: I herd you like My Little Pony... so come share stories of how you got into the fandom!

title: Artist and Writer Hangout - Saturday
description: It's been a long day of con-going, and maybe you just want a place to chill for a bit. Join a bunch of artists and writers hanging out together. Talk shop, rest your sore hooves, and maybe catch your breath if you've been hanging out at Ponystock!

title: Midnight Mares
description: Join Chris Gann, the creator of the Midnight Mares as he discusses the process of bringing an animated work to life on the screen. The first 50 attendees through the door will receive an exclusive toy and all remaining attendees will receive another exclusive gift!

title: Betrayal at House on the Hill & Betrayal at Baldur's Gate
description: As the day ends, a new adventure begins! Bring your friends and explore the haunted mansion and the streets of Baldur's Gate. Be warned, there might be a traitor among you...

title: Open Gaming
description: Even though it's late, that doesn't mean the fun has to stop! Wander in for a variety of fun and games!

title: Everfree Family Feud
description: Two groups of VIP guests face off in a family friendly feud to finally settle the most important question of all: Who is best pony?

title: Fluxx
description: Quest for the Holy Grail, fight for justice, or maybe you are made of sugar, spice, and everything nice? Pick from our multiple copies of Fluxx. The rules are simple, yet ever-changing!

title: Quills and Sofas Brunch
description: Join PixelKitties, Jim Miller, Katrina Hadley, G.M. Berrow, and Josh Haber for an exclusive VIP brunch!

title: Suited for Success
description: Hey cosplayers!  Do you strive to put more fabulosity into your wardrobe?  Of course you do!  Come join our talented pony cosplayers to learn how to evolve your craft through wig styling, prop making and putting the "play" in cosplay!

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it! Or just come to chill.

title: Unicorn Planters with Rarity!
description: Join Rarity, Fluttershy, and Rainbow Dash for some Arts & Crafts fun! Grow your own Tree of Friendship in a magical planter you can make and decorate yourself!

title: Beyond the Map: Worldbuilding in Equestria and Beyond
description: Learn how to properly build a setting that isn’t completely fleshed out! We have our maps of Equestria, but we don’t know very much about the rest of Equus. Join Monochromatic and the writing staff to talk about making the greater world of ponies seem even more awesome than it already is.

title: Pet Rock Workshop with the Pies!
description: Do you like rocks? Ever wanted to keep one as your own pet? Join Maud Pie and her sisters as they help you to create and keep your very own unique pet rock!

title: Shipping Is Magic!
description: Pony-artist ChoralSeashelle explores the history of MLP shipping art and fanfic, and how we can promote love and acceptance through our work.

title: MLP:CCG Chaos is Magic
description: In this Continuous Chaos Charity Sealed event where the rules change constantly and the points don't matter, you'll get all the chaos you can handle and a bit more! Players will get 8 packs to build a deck, and are encouraged to "help" by bringing cards from other games, pony plushies or toys, and extra Mane Characters. $20 entry fee.

title: PMV Contest
description: They've put in the work, now it's time to put it on display! Come on down and see our annual pony music video contest entries.

title: How 2 Girl and Guy - Writing Across Genders
description: Worry that because you're a guy, you can't write a good female character? Maybe you're a girl, and aren't sure the you're writing convincing male characters? Want to learn how few differences there actually are between boys and girls? Come join us for the How to Girl and Guy panel!

title: Friendship Lessons
description: Being disabled can be tough, but friends make things easier! We'll talk about overcoming fears and hardships so you can make friends. Everyone is welcome to come talk and make a friend!

title: Dominion
description: Build your own kingdom, and defend yourself from those who may try and cause your downfall in this deck-building game!

title: Equestria Daily Returns to Everfree!
description: Ever wonder what it's like to volunteer for the internet's biggest My Little Pony fansite? Why sleep is something optional? Or whether Trixie is best pony? (Hint: she is.) Then this is the panel you cannot miss! Equestria Daily's here to answer all your questions!

title: Ask the Pie Sisters
description: Come ask Pinkie, Marble, Limestone, and Maud Pie whatever you want to know about Equestria's most rock-solid family.

title: Craft Foam Armor Part 2
description: Part 2 of out hands-on workshop for craft foam armor. We’ll cover painting and sealing of craft foam armor. Not necessary to have attended Part 1 on Saturday, but highly encouraged!

title: Legends of Equestria:
description: Legends of Equestria, an MMO game, is in Open Access Release & available for everyone to play, permanently, forever! Join members of the team for a panel demonstrating LoE, explaining its creation, & maybe even a sneak peek of upcoming content! There will also be a Q&A for your burning questions!

title: SM4SH Tournament
description: Sign up for some friendly competition, grab a controller and join us as we find out who is the best at Smash!

title: Personalized Journals!
description: Decorate your own journal so you can always have a place to write or draw!

title: Last-Minute Letters to the Princesses
description: Haven't written your letters to the princess yet? Hurry up, because they're almost here! Come write and decorate your scrolls.

title: Characterizing Characters
description: Ever wondered how to get into your character's heads? Worried about making sure your internal characterizations matches their actions? Join The Albinocorn, Monochromatic, and the writing staff as we discuss how to make the most of the wonderful characters we know and love.

title: Analyzing MLP Live! Feat. ILoveKimPossibleAlot, Silver Quill, and Friends!
description: ILoveKimPossibleAlot hosts a talk on the process of reviewing and analyzing MLP on YouTube.

title: Dear Princess, from the Foals
description: In the foals' version of the beloved panel, Princesses Celestia, Luna, Cadence, and Twilight come together to read letters they've been sent throughout the weekend, and hear stories from the foals themselves!

title: Ask the Mascots
description: Want to get to know Marina? Ask Mocha her favorite drink? Talk to Front Page about the stories she's covered? Or just chat with Novella and Sharp Focus? Then come to Ask the Mascots and ask!

title: Cosplay Repair & Lounge
description: Is your cosplay a little... worn? We have some supplies so you can fix it! Or just come to chill.

title: Meet the Show Writers and Directors
description: Ever wondered how an episode goes through the process of writing a script into translation to the screen? How does a simple idea become a good story? Join our VIP Writers and Directors as they answer these questions and more - with G.M. Berrow, Josh Haber, Katrina Hadley, and Jim Miller.

title: Ponies At Dawn
description: An interactive discussion with Faulty and John Kenza about the popular recurring Ponies At Dawn compilation albums full of top quality pony music, and the pony music scene in general.

title: MLP:CCG Learn to Play & Casual Play
description: Everypony is welcome to help solve all of Equestria's problems as you learn to play the official Collectible Card Game, and get a prize just for participating (while supplies last)! No prior gaming experience needed! Have a friend? Learn to play together! It takes about 20 minutes, so stop by! Foals welcome, but age 6+ recommended.

title: Buck: Legacy
description: Discover the dungeon-exploring pony card game, Buck: Legacy! Dive straight into a fantasy adventure and play a game at this event, where you'll also meet the game's creator! Players of all skill levels welcome. Never heard of the game before? Stop by and learn!

title: Iron Author Awards Ceremony
description: Judging and prize ceremony for Saturday's Iron Author competition - find out which story will take the glory!

title: Face-Painting with the Pie Sisters
description: Come and get your face painted by the Pie sisters!  Pinkie, Marble, Limestone, Maud...  this is gonna ROCK!

title: Ponegathon - Final Round
description: Come and join us for the final round of Ponegathon, our annual weekend-long contest of skill! Everyone is free to join us as our final contestants fight for the title! The winner of this round will be featured on-stage at Closing Ceremonies!

title: Dear Princess
description: In this beloved panel, the 4 pony princesses come together to read letters from attendees about what they've learned about friendship and life through Everfree and our community. Out of respect for the often-personal stories, recording of any kind is not allowed. Letters can be submitted all weekend at the Info Desk. Tissues will be provided!

title: Friendship Bracelets with Fluttershy & Applejack
description: Fluttershy and Applejack are making friendship bracelets. Have you made a special friend this year? Exchange a friendship bracelet so you never forget them!

title: Las Pegasus Gambit
description: Las Pegasus Gambit, the most exciting game in town returns to Seaddle! Based on the classic blackjack game show, contestants answer questions trying to get to 21 without going bust. Prizes!

title: MLP:CCG Trade and Casual Play
description: Wind down the convention by hanging out with other players, trading cards to fill out your binders, or having a casual game or two outside of a tournament. You never know what you might be able to trade for!

title: Charity Auction
description: An Everfree favorite year after year, our annual charity auction has raised thousands of dollars for reputable charities since 2012. Bid on one-of-a-kind MLP items donated by members of the community. Proceeds this year will benefit Washington Autism Alliance & Advocacy.

title: Modern Brony Music
description: Everyone knows the fandom hits that came out in 2012, but what's going on now? Come pick songs to listen to and discuss, and then learn where you can find new favorite tracks!

title: Kids Sunday Afternoon Board Games
description: Who doesn't love a good old game of Jenga, or even Chutes and Ladders? Let's relax after a Sunday lunch and play some games! We will have these and many more games set up for foals to play and have fun!

title: Singalong with the Pie Sisters
description: Come sing your heart out with the Pie Sisters (played by our fabulous Community Guest cosplayers) as they host a singalong featuring all your favorites from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic!

title: Reflecting on Convention Memories
description: Come share the bestest, funniest, amazingest, most beautiful, and most insanest con stories ever! An open mic panel, where everyone will have a turn to share their best con moment. (Please no recording and be nice!)

title: Open Read and Critique: Sunday
description: A group of rapid fire editing groups! Got a story? Stuck on a scene? This is about getting a few minutes to read your hook, and then get rapid fire reviews! A con favorite for Everfree!

title: Closing Ceremonies
description: The con has ended and it's time to say farewell. But don't skip out on the last event of the convention; we may have some special surprises in store for you! Come celebrate the memories and friendships made over the weekend as we sail off from another great year.

title: Attendee Feedback Panel
description: We value the voice of our attendees. The staff of EFNW 2018 will be accepting your yeas and neighs at this feedback/Q&A panel, located directly behind the Mane Stage ("Autographs" on map).
